item.title: Resume
item.description: Elizabeth Bohnhorst English/ Humanities Traverse City, MI 49685 elizabethbohnhorst@gmail.com (231) 392-4745 Education Michigan State University, English, 2003-2008 (NHS) Georgia College, MFA in Creative Writing, 2010-2013 (NHS) Work Experience Youth Intervention Specialist Pete’s Place - Traverse City, MI December 2019 to April 2020 Provided direct care to youth by dispensing meds, helping make meals, helping with homework, playing games, providing emotional support, etc. English Instructor The Leelanau School ​-​ Glen Arbor, MI

item.title: About Me
item.description: Elizabeth Bohnhorst is an author, poet, and artist living in Traverse City, Michigan.
